A wizard whose insatiable desire for arcane power eclipsed their mortal life, the lich is a truly devious and versatile spellcaster. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 35 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30 [Lich](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3082) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 219 1.1 **Perception** +20; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Chthonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=114), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Diabolic](/Languages.aspx?ID=117), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118) **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +28, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +24, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +17, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +20 **Str** +0 **Dex** +4 **Con** +0 **Int** +6 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Items** [_invisibility potion_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2944), [_scroll of teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1720), [_greater staff of fire_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3041) --- **AC** 31 **Fort** +17 **Ref** +21 **Will** +23 +1 status to all saves vs. [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) **HP** 190 ([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83), rejuvenation) **Immunities** bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95) **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) 10, physical 10 (except magical bludgeoning) **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=64)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=542), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=590), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647)) 60 feet, DC 29
**Counterspell** **Trigger** A creature casts a spell the lich has prepared; **Effect** The lich expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. The lich loses their spell slot as if they had cast the triggering spell. The lich then attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** hand +24 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 4d8 void plus siphon life **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 36, attack +26 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Frostbite](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715) - **1st** [Enfeeble](/Spells.aspx?ID=1513) (×2), [Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Sure Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1709) - **2nd** [Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [False Vitality](/Spells.aspx?ID=1523), [Resist Energy](/Spells.aspx?ID=256), [See the Unseen](/Spells.aspx?ID=1663) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Force Barrage](/Spells.aspx?ID=1536), [Locate](/Spells.aspx?ID=173), [Vampiric Feast](/Spells.aspx?ID=1736) - **4th** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125), [Translocate](/Spells.aspx?ID=1724) - **5th** [Howling Blizzard](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559) (×2), [Toxic Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=1722), [Wall of Ice](/Spells.aspx?ID=364) - **6th** [Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353) **Drain Soul Cage** 6th rank **Siphon Life** DC 34 **Steady Spellcasting** If a reaction would disrupt the lich's spellcasting action, the lich attempts a DC 15 flat check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
